title: Ep. 206 Lindsay Hall: Why I Hope Oil Prices Move Lower
itunes:title: Lindsay Hall: Why I Hope Oil Prices Move Lower
description: Lindsay Hall is a big buyer of oil – if prices continue to pull back. She also highlights key technical levels on gold and silver – and shows us how to use options for protection against a pullback in the markets.
content:encoded: Lindsay Hall is a big buyer of oil – if prices continue to pull back. She also highlights key technical levels on gold and silver – and shows us how to use options for protection against a pullback in the markets.
